rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with a small foyer, adhering to Vastu principles by placing it on the east side for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area including seating, dining and entertainment space with large windows facing east to capture natural light. Incorporates Vastu by aligning seating towards the north.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen integrated with living area, designed with functional workflow and equipped with modern appliances. Vastu compliant with south-east placement for prosperity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located on the north side to ensure positive energy. Includes built-in storage and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for guests, ensuring privacy with a separate entrance if needed, placed on the south side to balance energy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom attached to master bedroom. Vastu suggests positioning away from the main entrance and aligned with the north or east direction.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Main entrance door facing the east for auspicious entry. Reinforced design following local safety norms.

openings.name: Patio Door
openings.description: Door leading to the garden/yard area positioned towards the south-west in accordance with Vastu.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Dedicated service door for deliveries and utilities on the west side.
